mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fleeting_time.checkin_record (user_id, latitude, longitude, city, province, timestamp, note, device, created_time, updated_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{city}, #{province}, #{timestamp}, #{note}, #{device}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedTime})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) > 0 FROM fleeting_time.checkin_record WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND city = #{city}
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT city) FROM fleeting_time.checkin_record WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT * FROM fleeting_time.checkin_record WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY timestamp DESC
